short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a strudel repl on mastodon posts containing '// # strudel' or strudel URLs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a code editing window for every Mastodon post containing strudel (a JS version of TidalCycles, a live coding language for art) source code (any line containing '// # strudel'), a strudel.cc or strudel.tidalcycles.org URL.
